name: spsbcdi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w2))

|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1)
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w2))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

comment: A lemma for eliminating a universal quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
